rows.label: qst701204_msg0001
rows.name: Just a scrap of paper? Seriously?

rows.label: qst701204_msg0002
rows.name:
It says "Nox Promontory"...
and that's it.

rows.label: qst701204_msg0003
rows.name:
He could have at least signed it
or something. How're we supposed
to make sense of anything now?

rows.label: qst701204_msg0004
rows.name:
Hold on. I've seen this kind of
writing before...

rows.label: qst701204_msg0005
rows.name:
It's been written with a Glass Pen.
When this is dried, hidden colors
will show themselves.

rows.label: qst701204_msg0006
rows.name:
You mean, like a pen made of glass?
I've never heard of such a thing!

rows.label: qst701204_msg0007
rows.name:
One of Iira's finest inventions. It
only caught on with enthusiasts, so I'm
not surprised you haven't heard of it.

rows.label: qst701204_msg0008
rows.name:
Indeed. But this means there's a good
chance that this writing belongs to
Thales himself.

rows.label: qst701204_msg0009
rows.name:
This "Nox Promontory" may be worth
checking out, then.
